nodes.text: The toxic hazard zone was created in the northern side of Section X, a region of the Belsavis prison on the planet Belsavis, when agents of the Dread Masters sabotaged bioforming nodes in the area. The nodes caused toxic plants to spread rapidly and mutate animals in the area..
The toxic hazard zone appears in Section X, a Daily Area added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 1.5.
